All Classes

Class
Description
AlaCarte
AlaCarte class that represents the alacarte menu items in the menu.
AlaCarte.Type
The enumeration of possible type of food choices in the menu
Customer
Represents a customer of the restaurant.
Menu
Menu the class that manages the menu items to be served in the restaurant
MenuItem
an abstract declaration of a menu item in the menu
Order
Represents an order tagged to a specific table.
OrderItem
Represents an order item in an order.
OrderManager
Manages the lists of orders in the restaurant.
Promotion
A Promotional set of alacarte item thats also a menu item.
Reservation
Represents a reservation made for the restaurant.
ReservationManager
ReservationManager is the class that manages all methods related to reservations in the restaurant, such as creating reservations and checking for existing reservations made.
Restaurant
Restaurant is the main class used to run the Restaurant Reservation and Point of Sale System (RRPSS)
Staff
Represents a staff of the restaurant.
Staff.Gender
The enumeration of possible gender of staff.
Staff.JobTitle
The enumeration of possible job titles of staff.
Table
Represents a single table in the restaurant.
TableManager
TableManager is the class that manages the tables and all methods related to the tables in the restaurant.
